pages.scene: Outline standing in sunny backyard garden, noticing something unusual
pages.setting: bright sunny backyard with colorful flowers and butterflies
pages.text: Once upon a time, there was a curious child named {{name}} who loved to explore.

pages.scene: Outline discovering a tiny magical door hidden behind garden shed
pages.action: kneeling down to look at small door
pages.setting: garden shed corner with ivy and golden light from door crack
pages.text: One sunny morning, {{name}} discovered a tiny door hidden behind the garden shed. Golden light sparkled from underneath.

pages.scene: Outline reaching toward the tiny door handle
pages.setting: close view of magical door with intricate patterns
pages.text: "I wonder where this leads," {{name}} whispered, turning the golden handle.

pages.scene: Outline stepping into magical forest with glowing flowers
pages.action: stepping through doorway into magical world
pages.setting: enchanted forest with glowing blue and pink flowers, soft magical lighting
pages.text: The door opened to a magical forest filled with glowing flowers and friendly creatures!

pages.scene: Outline meeting a wise friendly owl on a branch
pages.setting: magical forest clearing with ancient tree, small woodland creatures watching
pages.text: A wise owl flew down from a branch. "Welcome, {{name}}! We've been waiting for someone brave like you."

pages.scene: Outline walking through forest with owl flying alongside
pages.setting: winding path through magical forest with fireflies
pages.text: "There's someone who needs your help," said the owl. "Will you come with me?"

pages.scene: Outline discovering baby dragon stuck in thornbush
pages.setting: forest clearing with thornbush, cute baby dragon with big eyes
pages.text: In a clearing, {{name}} found a baby dragon tangled in a thornbush. "Don't worry, little one," {{name}} said softly.

pages.scene: Outline carefully helping free the baby dragon
pages.setting: close view of gentle rescue, forest friends watching
pages.text: Gently and carefully, {{name}} untangled the thorns one by one.

pages.scene: Baby dragon happily nuzzling child in thanks
pages.setting: sunny forest clearing, flowers blooming around them
pages.text: The baby dragon was free! It nuzzled {{name}} happily. "Thank you, thank you!" it chirped.

pages.scene: Outline surrounded by grateful forest creatures celebrating
pages.setting: magical forest party with woodland creatures, soft glowing lights
pages.text: All the forest creatures gathered around. "{{name}} is a true hero!" they cheered.

pages.scene: Outline at the tiny door saying goodbye to new friends
pages.setting: tiny door in forest, sunset colors, friends gathered to say goodbye
pages.text: As the sun set, the owl said, "You can visit anytime, {{name}}. True adventurers are always welcome here."

pages.scene: Outline back in garden looking at stars
pages.action: sitting in garden looking up at stars
pages.setting: backyard garden at dusk with first stars appearing
pages.text:
{{name}} stepped back through the tiny door, heart full of magic, knowing the adventure was just beginning.

The End.
